achievements.desc: Participated in technical symposium at SRM Ramapuram campus, Chennai and awarded winner of web development Tecblaze 2020.
Participated in technical symposium at DG vaishnav college, chennai and awarded web development Cyberfest 2020 by holding second position.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio website which you have seen now is build by using React.js and also used the Aos library to provide animate on scroll in these site. If you want to contact me, you can contact me through the page located on the bottom of these site.

projects.name: User Management System
projects.description: A simple CRUD application done only by using Express.js with EJS

projects.name: Eathenaeum
projects.description: A small e-library website created by using Express.js with EJS and also done some preprocessing using PowerBI

projects.name: CovidTracker
projects.description: Covid tracker website is build by using angular framework to show the cases of covid in detail summary and also with mapbox api to show the location on map

projects.name: Meet-in
projects.description: Meet-in site is a WebRTC application which is free and provides realtime communication via simple API. PeerJS wraps the browser's WebRTC implementation to provide a peer-to-peer connection API which is used in these application and moreover react.js library gives a flexibility to manage these API and performance to this application with some unit testing.

projects.name: Vdgamedb
projects.description: Vdgamedb website is build by using angular framework which gives the detailed overview of video games information is fetch by using rawg api.
